channel.title: Client.java Updater (program)
channel.description:
what if you needed to update your client and the only way was to loose your players and upload a newer version. to your mopar server status page.?
you can fix that now.
i just created a client.java updater. what you need to do is run soem free website that you can awlays edit. MAKE SURE you CAN DIRRECT LINK i perfer using windows 7s IIS7 hosting a home server on your no-ip on your mopar port. if you do this make sure in the MIME file TYPES you add A new Rule with the file format: .java
or if you you your own website. if oyu want to change your no ip. edit it in your client.java then upload it to your website.
rember. once you insert the updater into your client the url you installed in the updater must be the same when ever you change it. then it will update every start to make sure all players will have your corrent no-ip to play the server.
things you will need to edit. you will have to insert your compilers name in the program you will have to insert your rungame.bat's name in the program you will have to insert your client.javas url.
pictures: [img]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/3033/facepj.png[/img]
Source Download Link:
http://www.mediafire.com/?hg0yp0lpf3alzcm
Please Give Some Credits To ME .
Thanks

item.description:

Why not just make the client check on start up if any files in a database have been changed/modified & if they have it downloads those files.

item.title: Client.java Updater (program)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=472645.msg3456569#msg3456569 date=1294086499]

[quote author=gooasco link=topic=472645.msg3456562#msg3456562 date=1294086398]
the thing is they cant. the server creator needs visual studio 2010. they can modify it only.

that is why the url textbox is read only
[/quote]Ok. I see what it is now. But even then, in order to get people to download the file, they’d need to post a notice. Why not just post the URL to the java file, rather than this?
[/quote]They would even need to compile to get desired results, as this downloads a Java class, and not the bytecode.[/quote]… either way, they could post a link to the .class

Read full topic

how is this stupid. instead fo wasting your time fricken uploading a new client why not just use this updater to do the stuff for you.
[/quote]this is why it is stupid, and it hardly made sense.[/quote]
there is reason to this if you need to fix something importian. what if you were going to rename some items? youd have to modify everything that says client to class 8

[quote=“Davidi2, post:5, topic:376723”]If we know the URL of the file, we could just go to the website and get it from there?[/quote]yes david we could. but how would players know if you never posted a notice on the server?
